about_the_game:
"Shan Hai Express" is an interactive narrative game inspired by the nonlinear structure of the ancient Chinese mythological text, "Shan Hai Jing".

In this game, player wake up on a mysterious train which is moving in an painting. Player can freely explore its carriages, uncover the hidden secrets of this train. In the process of exploration, players will randomly encounter some creatures from the "Shan Hai Jing" each narrating its own story.

This game was created as the graduation project of Siwei Cai and Ise Lee in June, 2023.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit version 1909 revision .1350 or higher, or versions 2004 and 20H2 revision .789 or higher.
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX-2000 series and higher, or AMD RX-6000 series and higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 with DirectX 12 support
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12

short_description: Step aboard Shan Hai Express and experience an fantasy journey through the world of the ancient Chinese mythology Shan Hai Jing ( 山海经 ). This is an interactive narrative game inspired by the nonlinear structure of the text of "Shan Hai Jing".
